entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Morrisburg
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the morning then snow. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Low zero. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries overnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 then light after midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023
